title: Matching (1 point each, 15 total)
instructions: Select the correct answer from the dropdown (be sure to scroll all the way down and read CAREFULLY).

prompts.question: In the 90s (5th Gen), what was a non-shooter killer app on the PC?
What game first popularized the first person shooter genre?
Who invented the predecessor to Monopoly in 1903, The Landlord's Game?
What happened in the early 70s for electronic gaming?
What action-adventure survival did very poorly on initial release but slowly built up a base?
Games prior to the 19th century were primarily ________ games
Who pioneered the ability to play multiple games on a single console?
What do you develop during pre-production to prove your concept works?
What was created in response to violence and graphic imagery in video games?
Independent companies that create games but do not publish them are called.

word_bank.text: The Crash and Recovery of the Game Industry
